traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Naergoth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Naergoth makes three attacks, either with his longsword or longbow. He can use Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

actions.name: Life Drain
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (5d6 + 3 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage, or 10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) if used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage.
